welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bonita, a charming city known for its beautiful beaches, lively atmosphere, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Bonita has to offer during your stay. Have a wonderful time!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights and houses the airport's amenities.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's wifi network for free.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at General A. L. Rodriguez International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at General A. L. Rodriguez International Airport, primarily serving low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be limited in certain areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Island NAS Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at North Island NAS Airport is used exclusively by the United States Navy.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a password is required for access.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at San Diego International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second terminal at San Diego International Airport, serving primarily international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gillespie Field Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Gillespie Field Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminal.
